# Government Tender Announcement
## Details of the Tender
### Title
* Abrasive Spreader
* **Épandeur à Abrasif** (French)
* Solicitation Number: WS4531336752
* Reference Number: WS4531336752-Doc4603078341

### Tender Status
* The tender has expired.

### Key Information
* Solicitation Publication Date: May 28, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 12, 2024, 2:00 PM (local time)
* The expected contract start and end dates are to be determined.

### Procurement Details
* Province-wide tender, subject to Canadian laws and regulations
* Competitive, open bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services

### End User and Contractor Details
* End User: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa ON K1P 0P9
* Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5

### Contact Information
* Catherine Mezey, Procurement Specialist
* Email: [catherine.mezey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.mezey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL
* Available via the Ariba Discovery platform: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19845301>

This is a request for proposal (RFP) to acquire an abrasive spreader, compatible with Correctional Service Canada's equipment, including:
* Technical drawing
* Installation and delivery

The full details of the bid opportunity, including the SOW, can be accessed via the Ariba Discovery platform.

If approved, contracted services will be perfomed in La Macaza, Quebec. The tender has expired, but bidders should consult the Contracting Authority if they wish to dispute the expiration timeline.
